"Protection: Starforce".....Duuuude! =/.
I'm all for supporting smaller independant game-developers but StarForce ain't no good!

Avira says crack is a Trojan, type TR/Crypt.XPACK.Gen2. 

It could be a false positive, since most cracks do behave like virusses, but how to be sure it is really NOT a virus??
did you guy noticed that installation folder name is Connon Fodder 3? weird.
@ Snowwie888 it's a false positive, i would never upload anything that was infected!

Thanks boobsman +1

Works great.
If you cant start the game just run as administator and it will start.

C'mon people! If there's two things this guy is about is being virus free (In more ways than one ;) Lol) And tits. And that's the best thing. Thanks man!

Hey guy's, make sure you run your "desktop shortcut" as "administrator". I'm running Win7 64bit.  And found it has a quirk, and as long as you run it like that? Runs every time. Hope I help others! Please don't be a weed, and seed for other users! Good game, and thanks again BOOBSMAN!
